text: Far from Moscow () is a 1950 Soviet war drama movie directed by Aleksandr Stolper.Как в Петрозаводске проходило становление советского киноДалеко от Москвы (1950) The movie is based on Vasily Azhayev's 1948 novel of the same title. It stars Nikolay Okhlopkov, Lev Sverdlin, and Pavel Kadochnikov. ==Actors== * Nikolay Okhlopkov as Batmanov * Lev Sverdlin as Zalkind * Pavel Kadochnikov as Kovshov * Valerian Kvachadze as Beridze * Aleksandr Khanov as Topolev * Grigori Kirillov as Grubskiy * Tatyana Makhova as Tanya * Ivetta Kiselyova as Zhenya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1950 drama movies Category:1950s war movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Stolper
title: Far from Moscow
